The Ninth Jedi is an upcoming animated television series created for the streaming service Disney+. It is part of the Star Wars franchise and the first standalone spinoff series from Star Wars: Visions Presents.
The series is scheduled to premiere on Disney+ in 2026.
Production
During the April 2025 Star Wars Celebration, James Waugh announced that Star Wars: Visions would begin standalone spinoff series to tell longer form stories that began as shorts in the anthology series. The first Star Wars: Visions Presents series is The Ninth Jedi after the Volume 1 episode and a Volume 3 continuation, which was also announced at Celebration Japan.
